translations: [植] 蒿属植物（产于美国西部）

sentences.sentence: Here they wait out the frozen months, feeding mainly on sagebrush blown clear of snow.
sentences.translation: 它们在这里度过冰天雪地的几个月，主要以被雪刮掉的灌木蒿为食。
他们使山艾树的数目受到控制。

sentences.sentence: Fire and wind raged all around, snapping juniper trees and incinerating the sagebrush.
sentences.translation: 四周风火肆虐，猛咬着杜松树，把山艾树烧成了灰烬。
